entry.title: 1landres/psfree-lapse: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.
entry.content: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.

entry.title: vladanila/imagist: Imagist is a lightweight, client-side image editing tool built with HTML, CSS (Tailwind CSS and custom styles), and vanilla JavaScript. It offers a clean, modern, and intuitive interface, inspired by Apple's design aesthetic, allowing users to perform common image manipulation tasks directly in their browser.
entry.content: Imagist is a lightweight, client-side image editing tool built with HTML, CSS (Tailwind CSS and custom styles), and vanilla JavaScript. It offers a clean, modern, and intuitive interface, inspired by Apple's design aesthetic, allowing users to perform common image manipulation tasks directly in their browser.
